Description: Pottery ostracon, with one incised line of Coptic (?) on exterior, from the rim of a vessel, inside of rim painted black, with inside of body painted with white oval.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394055) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394055)
